ud7.9:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ yena thūṇaṃ nāma mallānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
ud7.9:1.4: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ thūṇaṃ anuppatto”ti.
ud7.9:1.5: () Udapānaṃ tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūresuṃ:
ud7.9:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
ud7.9:2.2: Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
ud7.9:2.3: “iṅgha me tvaṃ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṃ āharā”ti.
ud7.9:3.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud7.9:3.2: “idāni so, bhante, udapāno thūṇeyyakehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi tiṇassa ca bhusassa ca yāva mukhato pūrito:
ud7.9:4.2: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
ud7.9:4.3: “iṅgha me tvaṃ, ānanda, etamhā udapānā pānīyaṃ āharā”ti.
ud7.9:4.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā pattaṃ gahetvā yena so udapāno tenupasaṅkami.
ud7.9:4.5: Atha kho so udapāno āyasmante ānande upasaṅkamante sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
ud7.9:5.2: “acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
ud7.9:5.3: Ayañhi so udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe ṭhito”ti.
ud7.9:5.4: Pattena pānīyaṃ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud7.9:5.5: “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ, bhante, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā.
ud7.9:5.6: Ayañhi so, bhante, udapāno mayi upasaṅkamante sabbaṃ taṃ tiṇañca bhusañca mukhato ovamitvā acchassa udakassa anāvilassa vippasannassa yāva mukhato pūrito vissandanto maññe aṭṭhāsi.
ud7.9:5.7: Pivatu bhagavā pānīyaṃ, pivatu sugato pānīyan”ti.
ud7.9:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
